attributes.action: support the Friends of Brandwood End Cemetery in their efforts to save the twin Grade II listed Victorian Chapels at Brandwood End Cemetery, Birmingham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Brandwood End Cemetery has twin Grade II listed Victorian chapels that have fallen into disrepair and are in danger of being lost if the decay is not halted and rectified.  

Our aim is that the petition will finally make Birmingham City Council acknowledge their responsibility for preserving our architectural and cultural heritage and support our efforts to restore these listed Chapels

rejection.details: We suggest you contact the local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
